Summary: {dr}Saw a silver orb. floating over Payson ut.towards n.e. downtown. then vanished
divs: Sighting DetailsWe are headed north bound on I 15 when we saw around silvery object floating shortly about the Payson skyline and then it suddenly vanished.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Payson
There were no other sightings in Payson on or around October 6th 2012
